import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import './productPage.css' import { useState } from 'react' export default function ProductPage() { const product = useLocation() const [quantity, selectQuantity] = useState(1) return (

{ product.state.name }

<>

quantity === 1 ? {} : selectQuantity(quantity - 1) } style={{ fontWeight: 'bold', flexGrow: '1' }}>-

{quantity}

selectQuantity(quantity + 1) } style={{ fontWeight: 'bold', flexGrow: '1' }}>+

Thêm vào giỏ hàng

) }
